steps.name: Arrival on Aiur
steps.text: The warp gate hums as you materialize on the ancient Protoss homeworld of Aiur. The land is scarred, yet majestic. Ahead, a lone Templar stands, energy coursing through his psi blades. To your left, the ruins of an ancient archive call to you. Behind, the path to the warp gate flickers, unstable.

steps.name: Meeting the Templar
steps.text: The Templar eyes you cautiously. 'You should not have come alone,' he intones. 'The Zerg are everywhere.' He gestures toward a nearby ridge, where a group of Zealots awaits reinforcements.

choices.text: Join the Zealots in their charge.

steps.name: Exploring the Ruins
steps.text: The ruins hum with ancient psionic energy. Symbols glow faintly on the walls. As you approach, a sudden pulse of energy sweeps the room, and a faint voice echoes in your mind, 'The Khala is broken, but not lost.'

choices.text: Search for the source of the voice.

steps.name: Return to the Warp Gate
steps.text: You hesitate, feeling the weight of the mission. The warp gate flickers ominously, and just as you prepare to step through, a shadow falls over the gate. A Zerg overlord descends, blocking your path.

steps.name: Battle on the Ridge
steps.text: The ridge erupts into chaos as Zerglings swarm the Zealots. You find yourself locked in combat, your psi blade clashing against the onslaught.

choices.text: Regroup and form a defensive line.

steps.name: The Voice of the Ruins
steps.text: Following the psionic trail, you uncover an ancient shard of the Khala artifact, pulsating with immense energy.

choices.text: Attempt to merge with the shard.

steps.name: Facing the Overlord
steps.text: You charge at the Overlord, psi blade igniting as you strike its thick hide. It lets out a deafening roar, and in the distance, more Zerg are approaching.

choices.text: Fight through and head toward the shard.

steps.name: Shard Reached
steps.text: You reach the glowing shard of the Khala, its energy pulsing wildly. The fate of Aiur hinges on what happens next.

steps.name: Defensive Formation
steps.text: Your strategic mind prevails. Together with the Zealots, you hold the line, buying time to secure the shard.

steps.name: Strategic Retreat
steps.text: You carefully withdraw, carrying the shard with you. The Zerg pursue but seem repelled by the shard’s psionic energy.

steps.name: The Shard's Fate
steps.text:
As you hold the shard, its energy pulses through you. The fate of Aiur—and perhaps the galaxy—rests in your hands. What comes next is uncertain, but your path is set. 

To be continued...
